data.title: Prince of Persia®: The Sands of Time game revenue and stats on Steam – Steam Marketing Tool
data.meta_description: Game revenue estimates, number of reviews, review score and other stats
data.text:
Info

Steam link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/13600/

Short Description: Amidst the scorched sands of ancient Persia, there is a legend spun in an ancient tongue. It speaks of a time borne by blood and ruled by deceit. Drawn to the dark powers of a magic dagger, a young Prince is led to unleash a deadly evil upon a beautiful kingdom.

Platforms: Windows

Publisher: Ubisoft

Developer: Kudosoft

Release: Dec 2, 2003 (20 years, 8 months ago)

Price: $9.99

Reviews: 3,749

Score: 9/10

Followers: 7,557

Tags: 3D Platformer Action Action-Adventure Adventure Atmospheric Classic Controller Fantasy Great Soundtrack Hack and Slash Parkour Platformer Puzzle Puzzle Platformer Retro Singleplayer Story Rich Third Person Time Manipulation Time Travel

Genres: Action, Adventure
